name: Amazing Race
description: This event offers participants the opportunity to experience a unique in-flight experience through time. It also encourages them to apply NICE Teamwork, Fish Philosophy and Critical Thinking values and skills that they have acquired throughout their time at Nanyang Polytechnic. Beyond the adventure, this event serves as a platform for students and alumni to bond, creating cherished memories and strengthening friendships.

name: Entrepreneur Insights
description: The event aims to inspire students by showcasing Mr. Satriaâ€™s personal and professional achievements, offer practical advice on navigating the tech industry and entrepreneurship, and encourage an open dialogue between Mr. Satria and the students.

name: PFP Club Camp
description: I was part of the committee that organized the inaugural PFP Club Camp. As the media in-charge of the event, I was responsible for creating the promotional materials for the event, including the posters, Instagram stories and the montage video.

name: PFP Outreach @ SGSS
description: I was part of the team leading an outreach programme at Serangoon Garden Secondary School. I was involved in developing the AR cards that help students learn the United Nations Sustainable Development Goals.

name: PFP Open House
description: I was a committee member involved in organizing NYP's PFP Open House 2024. I was in charge of compiling the overall logistics of the event, developing the microsite detailing PFP students' experiences, and ensuring that nothing went wrong during the actual event.

name: PFP Design Competition
description: I was involved in organizing the inaugural PFP Design Competition where PFP students design custom shirts for the cohort. We had over five participants who joined and had over a hundred orders for the shirt.
